entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
